== Kattur (CT) (627924) ==

Kattur (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 11.7 sq. km. and harbouring 4480 households with total population of 18017 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 31 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 285 km. Male population is 8315 and female population is 9702. Scheduled Caste population is 2675 and Scheduled Tribes population is 22. Census Location Code of the town is 627924<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 31 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 65 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 10 km.
